DOC.brief_summary: This study cross-sectional study . The primary aim study compare relationship neurological function , metabolic measure health-related behavior normal weight overweight/obese perimenopausal woman .
DOC.detailed_description: To examine physiological behavioral factor may help determine health perimenopausal middle age woman . Neuroendocrine function measure broad assessment hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal ( HPA ) activity . We also assess metabolic profile behavioral emotional function . We plan determine correlation measure nutritional state . Other measure may include insulin , glucose , leptin , IGF-1 , triglyceride , free fatty acid , ghrelin eat attitude physical reactivity .
